plot: Once upon a time... a long time ago, in the white silence.... The Army of Love, an army of mini-cloned fairies, finds Ox & Xo, two lovers, frozen in their love story... The "Army Of Love", a short musical fairytale in animation style.
title: Army of Love
plot_es: Once upon a time... a long time ago, in the white silence.... The Army of Love, an army of mini-cloned fairies, finds Ox & Xo, two lovers, frozen in their love story... The "Army Of Love", a short musical fairytale in animation style.
plot_en: Once upon a time... a long time ago, in the white silence.... The Army of Love, an army of mini-cloned fairies, finds Ox & Xo, two lovers, frozen in their love story... The "Army Of Love", a short musical fairytale in animation style.
